name: Devouring Angel
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, prone
languages: understands Common and Celestial but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 1 Bite and 4 Claws. Can replace 1 Claw with Spiked Tongue.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 16 (2d10+5) piercing damage + 10 (3d6) acid.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spiked Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 20 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) bludgeoning damage and target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends target is restrained and takes 9 (2d8) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns and angel can pull the creature up to 15 ft. closer to it as a bonus action. Angel can have only one target grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Shed Spines (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Shakes its body sending acid-coated spines outward. Each creature within 10 ft. of it: 18 (4d8) piercing damage and 24 (7d6) acid (DC 17 Dex half).

special_abilities.name: Assisted Leaping
special_abilities.desc: Can use its quasi-wings to fly up to 30' on its turn but it must start and end its move on a solid surface such as a roof or the ground. If it is flying at the end of its turn it falls to the ground and takes falling damage.

special_abilities.name: Flexible Form
special_abilities.desc: Can twist its body into unnatural positions allowing it to easily move through any opening large enough for a Small creature. It can squeeze through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The angel's destination must still have suitable room to accommodate its volume.

special_abilities.name: Limited Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: Can magically communicate simple ideas emotions and images telepathically with any creature within 100' of it that can understand a language.
